cnbc.title: Alphabet beats earnings expectations, raises spending forecast
cnbc.summary: The company increased its capital expenditures for 2025 by $10 billion due to "strong and growing demand for our Cloud products and services."

cnbc.title: Tesla reports sales miss as auto revenue drops for second straight quarter
cnbc.summary: Tesla’s second-quarter earnings call comes as Elon Musk’s automaker tries to revitalize EV sales and turn its robotaxis into moneymakers.

cnbc.title: Chipotle stock tumbles 9% after chain cuts same-store sales forecast
cnbc.summary: Shares of Chipotle have fallen 13% this year, dragging its market cap down to $71.1 billion.

cnbc.title: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix second-quarter profit and revenue hit record highs, topping estimates
cnbc.summary: Revenue rose about 35% in the June quarter compared with the same period a year earlier, while operating profit rose 68%, year on year.

cnbc.title: IBM shares drop as software revenue misses
cnbc.summary: IBM delivered stronger earnings and income than expected and raised its forecast for full-year free cash flow. But software revenue was a bit light.

cnbc.title: South Korea avoids technical recession as GDP expands 0.6% in second quarter
cnbc.summary: This was higher than the 0.5% expected by economists polled by Reuters, and a reversal from the 0.2% contraction seen in the first quarter.

cnbc.title: ServiceNow lifts guidance on AI growth
cnbc.summary: "Every business process in every industry is being refactored for agentic AI," said ServiceNow chair and CEO Bill McDermott in a release.

cnbc.title: Trump was told his name was in Jeffrey Epstein files before DOJ withheld documents: WSJ
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump was friends with Jeffrey Epstein for years before the two men had a falling-out.

cnbc.title: Japan trade deal info on Trump's desk was altered by hand with a marker
cnbc.summary: Details of the Japan deal seen in a photo posted by Dan Scavino, the White House deputy chief of staff, show discrepancies and last-minute edits.

cnbc.title: The 10 best U.S. states to retire—it's about more than 'just the number of sunny days and taxes'
cnbc.summary: If you want affordability, access to health care and neighborhood safety, you may want to look outside historically popular retirement destinations.
